summary: SummaryMEDIHEAL Watermide Moisture Pad provides intensive hydration for dry, dehydrated, fatigued skin. It delivers a cooling effect to de-puff and calm skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsProven to help lock in moisture and de-puffImproves hydration by 165% after 3 usesCooling effect instantly de-puffs skin by 15% after one useFeatures"Dermal Gel" jelly-like texture for a better fit on skin and a cooling effectSized (2.6") to cover a wide areaRounded corners for a perfect fit on skinKey IngredientsFormulated with MEDIHEAL's proprietary WaterActive complex and liposome delivery system for optimal resultsMicroparticlized WaterActive: Woodland Forget-me-not Flowers - 24-Hour Cold Extraction on Icelandic Glacial Water - With Liposome-based Technology - MicroparticlizedItem 2626999How To UseAs a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycereth-26, Betaine, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Abies Sibirica Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Junipers Mexican Oil, Chamomile Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Octyldodeceth-16, Sodium PCA, Hydroxyethl Urea, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Allantoin, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Glycerin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyluronic Acid, Potassium Hyaluronate, Proline, Hyluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Dimethylsilanol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone.
how_to_use: As a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.

reviews.headline: Super moisturizing
reviews.comments: This is my first time using mediheal and I really like these! I use one pad on my face and neck every couple days and it makes my skin feel really moisturized. After it dries, I apply serum, moisturizer and spf.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: I use these pads before bed, and when I wake up, my skin feels incredibly soft. I've also noticed a reduction in redness. I've always struggled with textured skin, but these pads have helped smooth out those little bumps. I'd definitely recommend them!

reviews.headline: Super Hydrating
reviews.comments: Really like this product dor healing the skin. If you have senstive dry skin. Totally recommend

reviews.headline: OILY skin approved
reviews.comments: Soft and thin toner pad. Unable to rip for smaller areas. Love using pads for DIY sheet mask. Very watery hydration BOMB! Does not leave a sticky film when left on my face for 10 min. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Great! Hydrating and Glowing
reviews.comments: Butttt it did break me out for the first week so I used pimple patches to sort of counter the breakouts. It really helped my eczema as well.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Beautiful things for the face . I've admired this purchase a hundred times. Price and quality

reviews.headline: Sensitive skin approved!
reviews.comments: I have skin that is picky with products, and after using this for about 3 weeks now I've seen a significant boost in the hydration in my skin. I really like these!

reviews.headline: So far… loving this product!
reviews.comments:
I did just buy this product in january and use it about 3 times a week or more if my skin is extra dey. Currently ive been going through the "Retinol uglies" and this (along with a couple other products) has been helping my dry skin! I like that the packaging comes with tweezers and that the pads are very soft on your skin. I usually put on one my forehead in a diamond shape and then i use clean scissors to cut another pad vertically for under my eyes. I leave them on till they fully absorb. It makes my skin care routine feel fancier than it really is!

The one con i have so far is im unsure where to buy the refills? I bought this in store thinking this was a cool concept for sustainability (although theres room for improvement) but i cannot locate the refills anywhere? Maybe its just me who cant find them but i probably would not buy it again in this packaging.

reviews.headline: So far not bad
reviews.comments: Let me start off by saying that I usually use La Mer products in winter - the Treatment Lotion and The Hydrating Revitalizing Serum followed by a moisturizer.  I picked up this packet of Mediheal pads mostly because they came in such a cute box that matches my bathroom decor, but also because they are moisturizing.  Today I tried them instead of my two La Mer products, and my skin feels the same as it does with the La Mer.  So this is quite the economical alternative.  I just used this as a toner pad because I can't be bothered to sit around with pads on my cheeks for 15 minutes.  The one problem I had is that these sheets are really, REALLY thin and flimsy, and it kept balling up under my fingers as I tried to wipe my face with the pad.  Also, without my glasses it was impossible to use the tweezers to pick out one single pad, so I just scrabbled around in the box with my fingers to get one.  This seems like a good product to replace my expensive stuff, when it runs out, and in the meantime I'll just keep practicing with them.

reviews.headline: I love this so hydrating
reviews.comments: The most hydrating thing I have put on my face. I have such dry skin and this really helps give that glass skin look.

reviews.headline: Great Moisture
reviews.comments: My dry skin absolutely loves these pads. I take two and let them sit on my cheeks for 15-20 minutes once a week and then use the excess to rub into my skin all over my face after and it feels amazing. Afterwards my skin is hydrated, plump and bouncy

reviews.headline: Good but…..
reviews.comments: This is my first time buying these and I got a few different pads for different concerns. So far I really like this one and it does hydrate and feel cool on the skin. Cant speak to the long term use as I just received them. But i did want to add this warning to others- the lid was still sealed so I know they werent tampered with but the pads were everywhere in the container. I pulled one out and a bunch came with it because even though it looked like it was on the top, it was actually partially under half the other pads. Im not sure if it was due to poor packaging or how they shifted during transit but I basically had to use the tweezers provided to realign the entire package.

reviews.headline: Slays
reviews.comments: I used this after i dermaplane along with the enezyme pads they carry and it genuinely helped moisturize without feeling oily or feeling heavy.

reviews.headline: Very hydrating
reviews.comments: Your skin will feel so amazing after use! Korean skincare is great for you- I tell all of my friends to purcahse Mediheal!
